title: patch 7.1
body: How much is the step 2 ?   It tells me 380MB  when I close the client and re enter it it says 980 MB .....anyone have the real size plz ?

replies.body: It sounds like your PC is scanning your game files to prepare for an update.  As long as you're not getting any errors, let it continue doing it's thing.  The time it takes can vary depending on each individual PC and their hardware.  If you are receiving an error, let me know and at what %.  I hope that helps!
